SEARCH
Package cdx.opencdx.communications.service

Interface OpenCDXCommunicationEmailService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OpenCDXCommunicationEmailServiceImpl
public interface OpenCDXCommunicationEmailService
Represents a service for communicating with OpenCDX via email.

  • Method Details

    • createEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate createEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate emailTemplate) throws OpenCDXClientException
      Create an Email Template
      Parameters:
      emailTemplate - EmailTemplate to create.
      Returns:
      the created EmailTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXClientException - OpenCDXNotAcceptable Failed to convert to JSON

    • getEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate getEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.TemplateRequest templateRequest) throws OpenCDXNotFound
      Retrieve an Email Template
      Parameters:
      templateRequest - Request ID of email template to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the requested EmailTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotFound - Template with requested ID not found.

    • updateEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate updateEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate emailTemplate) throws OpenCDXFailedPrecondition, OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Update an Email Template
      Parameters:
      emailTemplate - Updated EmailTemplate.
      Returns:
      updated EmailTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXFailedPrecondition - Missing template id.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • deleteEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.SuccessResponse deleteEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.TemplateRequest templateRequest) throws OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Delete an Email Template
      Parameters:
      templateRequest - Request ID of the email template to delete
      Returns:
      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • listEmailTemplates

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplateListResponse listEmailTemplates(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplateListRequest request)
      List of all EmailTemplates
      Parameters:
      request - Request indicating pagination, sorting, and page size.
      Returns:
      requested EmailTemplates with page, sorting, and page size
